name: tractability
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being tractable (= easily dealt with, controlled, or persuaded): He demands great skill, or, if you have none, great tractability. The engine was renowned for its easy tractability. See
tractable
More examplesFewer examplesThese are the two causes of my submission and tractability.The choice involves a trade-off between tractability and realism. His manner is brisk and affectionate, and his tractability is great.
